pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, March 20, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Orléans, Ontario

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will make a housing affordability announcement to highlight Budget 2019’s First-Time Home Buyer Incentive. A media availability will follow.

Cardinal Creek Village
Famille-Laporte Avenue and Geographe Terrace

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
  • Please note that this event will take place outdoors.
